ACTIVATED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: {2}: Equipped creature gains hexproof until end of turn.
{2}: La créature équipée acquiert la défense talismanique jusqu’à la fin du tour.
{2}: La criatura equipada gana la habilidad de antimaleficio hasta el final del turno.
{2}: Die ausgerüstete Kreatur ist bis zum Ende des Zuges fluchsicher.
{2}: La creatura equipaggiata ha anti-malocchio fino alla fine del turno.
{2}：装備しているクリーチャーはターン終了時まで呪禁を得る。
{2}: 장착된 생물은 턴종료까지 방호 능력을 얻는다.

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local parent = EffectSource():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then EffectDC():Set_CardPtr(0, parent) end
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local parent = EffectDC():Get_CardPtr(0) if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_HEXPROOF, 1 ) end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature if it’s blue.
Au début de votre entretien, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur la créature équipée si elle est bleue.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre la criatura equipada si es azul.
Lege zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments eine +1/+1-Marke auf die ausgerüstete Kreatur, falls sie blau ist.
All’inizio del tuo mantenimento, metti un segnalino +1/+1 sulla creatura equipaggiata se è blu.
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、装備しているクリーチャーが青ならばその上に+1/+1カウンターを１個置く。
당신의 유지단 시작에, 만약 장착된 생물이 청색이라면 그 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다.
В начале вашего шага поддержки положите один жетон +1/+1 на снаряженное существо, если оно синее.
No início de sua manutenção, coloque um marcador +1/+1 sobre a criatura equipada que seja azul.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: return ( EffectController():MyTurn() ~= 0 ) and ( MTG():GetStep() == STEP_UPKEEP ) and ( Object():GetParent() ~= nil ) and ( Object():GetParent():Test( COLOUR_BLUE ) ~= 0 )
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then if parent:GetColour():Test( COLOUR_BLUE ) ~= 0 then parent:AddCounters( MTG():PlusOnePlusOneCounters(), 1 ) end end

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) -- AI 'cannot reequip' exemption local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil and EffectController():IsAI() ~= 0 then filter:SetCardInstance(parent) filter:AddExtra(FILTER_EXTRA_FLIP_CARD_INSTANCE) end
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if (target_card ~= nil and EffectSource() ~= nil) then EffectSource():Attach( target_card ) end
